槍持ち: (やりもち) - spear carrier (for the master of a samurai family)
槍玉: (やりだま) - victim; scapegoat; someone singled out (for punishment, etc.)
槍玉にあがる: (やりだまにあがる) - to be made an example of; to be made a victim of; to be exposed to ridicule
槍玉にあげる: (やりだまにあげる) - to make an example of; to make a victim of; to hold up somebody (something) to ridicule; to single out someone for criticism
槍玉に上がる: (やりだまにあがる) - to be made an example of; to be made a victim of; to be exposed to ridicule
槍玉に上げる: (やりだまにあげる) - to make an example of; to make a victim of; to hold up somebody (something) to ridicule; to single out someone for criticism
槍玉に挙がる: (やりだまにあがる) - to be made an example of; to be made a victim of; to be exposed to ridicule
槍玉に挙げる: (やりだまにあげる) - to make an example of; to make a victim of; to hold up somebody (something) to ridicule; to single out someone for criticism
槍衾: (やりぶすま) - line of spears held at the ready
槍鱮: (ヤリタナゴ) - Tanakia lanceolata (species of cyprinid)
槐: (かい) - Type Of Japanese Pagoda Tree , Japanese pagoda tree (Acácia do Japão)
槐樹: (かいじゅ) - Japanese pagoda tree (Sophora japonica)
様: (zama) - () - título formal, bagunça, estado lamentável, situação difícil, cena triste; -modos, -direções; no ato de ..., exatamente quando se está ...; modo de ..., forma de ...
様あ見ろ: (ざまあみろ) - It serves you right
様だ: (ようだ) - (usu. at sentence-end) seeming to be/appearing to be; like/similar to; in order to (e.g. meet goal)/so that; (as ように at sentence-end) indicates hope, wish, request or mild command
様です: (ようです) - seeming to be/appearing to be; like/similar to
様に: (ように) - in order to (e.g. meet goal)/so that/take care (so as); hoping or wishing for something
様になる: (ようになる) - to reach the point that; to come to be that; to turn into
様はない: (ざまはない) - indecent; shameful; unsightly; pathetic
様は無い: (ざまはない) - indecent; shameful; unsightly; pathetic
様みろ: (ざまみろ) - serves you right!; see what happens!
様を見ろ: (ざまをみろ) - serves you right!; see what happens!
様変わる: (さまがわる) - to change the state of things
様子: (yousu) - estado, situação, circunstâncias; aparência, aspecto; sinal, indicação
様子をうかがう: (ようすをうかがう) - to wait and see; to see how the land lies
様子を伺う: (ようすをうかがう) - to wait and see; to see how the land lies
様子次第: (ようすしだい) - (yoji) according to circumstances; depending on the state of things; according to how the situation develops
様式化: (ようしきか) - stylization; to stylize/to conventionalize
様方: (さまかた) - care of; at the household of (when addressing letter, etc.); c-o
様様: (さまさま) - our gracious (Queen)/honorific that attaches to name of a person or thing that has bestowed grace or favour upon you; agreeable condition
様相を呈する: (ようそうをていする) - to appear the same; to be like; to seem to be; to be similar to
様相論理学: (ようそうろんりがく) - modal logic
様見ろ: (ざまみろ) - serves you right!; see what happens!
槙: (てん) - Twig , yew plum pine (Podocarpus macrophyllus)
槻の木: (つきのき) - Japanese zelkova (species of elm-like tree, Zelkowa serrata)
槻欅: (つきげやき) - Japanese zelkova (species of elm-like tree, Zelkowa serrata)
槿花一日: (きんかいちじつ) - (yoji) evanescent glory; passing prosperity
槿花一朝: (きんかいっちょう) - (yoji) evanescent glory; passing prosperity
樅: (しょう) - Fir , Japanese fir (Abeto firme), momi fir
樋: (とう) - Cano de água, canal, calha, tubo de água, canaleta, escorrega; coxa (de uma lâmina de espada)
樒: (みつ) - Árvore cujos galhos estão colocados sobre túmulos budistas
標す: (しるす) - (印す, 標す only)  to leave (a mark, trace, etc.)/to print/to stamp; to show a sign (i.e. an omen)
標徴: (ひょうちょう) - appearing on the surface; symbol/sign; distinguishing mark/diagnostic character
標数: (ひょうすう) - characteristic (of a ring or field in algebra)
標本分布: (ひょうほんぶんぷ) - sampling distribution
標本分散: (ひょうほんぶんさん) - sample variance
標本化: (ひょうほんか) - sampling (e.g. in signal processing)
標本化定理: (ひょうほんかていり) - sampling theorem
標本室: (ひょうほんしつ) - specimen room; herbarium
標本平均: (ひょうほんへいきん) - sample mean; sample average
標本抽出: (ひょうほんちゅうしゅつ) - sampling
標本時刻: (ひょうほんじこく) - sampling time
標本間隔: (ひょうほんかんかく) - sampling interval

標準アクセス速度: (ひょうじゅんアクセスそくど) - standard access rate
標準エラー: (ひょうじゅんエラー) - standard error
標準データ形式: (ひょうじゅんデータけいしき) - standard data format
標準モジュール: (ひょうじゅんモジュール) - standard module
標準ライブラリ: (ひょうじゅんライブラリ) - standard library
標準レンズ: (ひょうじゅんレンズ) - normal lens (photography); standard lens
標準以下: (ひょうじゅんいか) - below average
標準価格: (ひょうじゅんかかく) - standard price
標準偏差: (ひょうじゅんへんさ) - standard deviation; SD
標準光源: (ひょうじゅんこうげん) - {astron} standard candle; standard light source
